name: Hive'Regal Scout Report
tooltip:
Hive'Regal Scout ReportLevel 60

Contact Cenarion Scout Landion inside Hive'Regal and return the Hive'Regal Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Hive'Regal Scout Report
